## Vector2.DistanceOfPointFromSegment() method

Gets the shortest distance (float) between the point "p" and the segment defined by the two points "segA" and "segB".

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static DistanceOfPointFromSegment(p: Vector2, segA: Vector2, segB: Vector2): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  p | <code>Vector2</code> | defines the middle point |
|  segA | <code>Vector2</code> | defines one point of the segment |
|  segB | <code>Vector2</code> | defines the other point of the segment |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`

the shortest distance
